channel.title: Neutron Imaging on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Neutron Imaging on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Contacts
item.description: Hassina Bilheux - Instrument ScientistExpertise: HFIR and SNS imaging beam lines Short Bio ... Dr. Hassina Bilheux obtained her Ph.D. in Physics at the Univ. of Versailles, France. Her work focused on plasma physics at the Oak Ridge National Laboratory’s Physics Division. She has developed neutron imaging capabilities at ORNL’s High Flux Isotope Reactor CG-1D beamline and is prototyping neutron imaging at the Spallation Neutron Source.

item.title: Github Repositories
item.description: Our gloal is to only develop open source tools. You will find here a list of the major repositories hosting our programs jupyter notebooks used in the analysis of the data python_notebooks python library used for normalization neunorm Imaging Resonance python library imagingReso iBeatles for Bragg Edge fitting iBeatles set of jupyter widgets ipywe Root analysis library RootPlantProcessing
